article: Terry was a middle-aged businessman.He was unsuccessful in career and often complained that he had been fooled by others. One day he told his wife he was  _  disappointed with the city that he had to leave. So his family moved to another city.It was Saturday  _  . When Terry and his wife were busy putting their things in their new home,the lights suddenly  went out  and they were forced to stop work.Terry was sorry to have  _  to bring along some candles.Just then he heard light  _  on his door. "Who is it?" he wondered.Terry knew  _  else in the new city, and this was the moment he especially hated to be  _  .He opened the door impatiently. At the door was a little  _  , shyly asking,"Sir, do you have  _  ? I'm your neighbor.""No."answered Terry angrily.He shut the door  _  . After a while the door was knocked again.He opened it and found the same little girl outside.But this time she was  _  two candles radiating red light.she said,"My grandma told me the  _  neighbor downstairs might need candles.She sent me here to give you these" At that moment Terry suddenly realized what  _  his failure in life. It was his indifference and unkindness to other people.The person who had fooled him in life was actually nobody else  _  himself, for his eyes had been covered by his  _  mind.
